title: Verify API JWT Authentication Enforcement
description: Ensure that all API endpoints reject requests without a valid JWT token and accept requests with valid tokens.

steps.description: Send API request to /api/projects without JWT token
API should reject request with 401 Unauthorized
Send API request to /api/projects with invalid JWT token
API should reject request with 401 Unauthorized
Send API request to /api/projects with valid JWT token
API should accept request and respond with 200 OK or appropriate success response

title: Create Project with Valid Data
description: Test creating a new project with valid input data via POST /api/projects and verify success and audit logging.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/projects with valid project data payload
Verify response status 201 Created and response body contains created project details
Query audit logs for the project creation event
Audit log should capture full before and after states reflecting the new project creation

title: Reject Project Creation with Invalid Data
description: Verify the API enforces input validation rules and rejects project creation requests with invalid or malformed data.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/projects with missing required fields
API should respond with 400 Bad Request and descriptive error message
Send POST request to /api/projects with invalid field formats (e.g., invalid dates)
API should respond with 400 Bad Request highlighting format errors

title: Update Project Status with Valid Transitions
description: Ensure updating a project status respects allowed status transition rules and updates data correctly.

steps.description: Send PATCH request to /api/projects/:id to change status from 'Planning' to 'In Progress'
API accepts the update and returns success with updated project data
Send PATCH request to /api/projects/:id with disallowed status transition
API rejects with 400 Bad Request and descriptive error message
Verify audit logs capture before and after states of the status update
Audit logs contain detailed records of the status change

title: Soft Delete a Project
description: Verify that deleting a project marks it as deleted without physically removing data and audit log records the operation.

steps.description: Send DELETE request to /api/projects/:id for an existing project
Response status 200 OK indicates successful soft deletion
Fetch the project via GET /api/projects/:id
Project is marked as deleted but data is still present
Check audit logs for a delete action entry with correct before and after data capturing the deletion flag
Audit log entry found with complete information

title: Create Task with Resource Allocation Warning
description: Verify that creating a task allocates resources and triggers warnings if allocation exceeds 80% capacity and prevents creation if above 100% without override.

steps.description: Create a task assigning resources that cumulatively exceed 80% but less than or equal to 100% utilization
API warns about high resource utilization but allows task creation
Create a task assigning resources that cumulatively exceed 100% capacity without override flag
API rejects task creation with clear error about resource overallocation
Create a task assigning resources exceeding 100% capacity with override flag enabled
API accepts creation despite overallocation warning

title: Fetch Dashboard Metrics Performance and Accuracy
description: Ensure the dashboard metrics endpoint returns accurate aggregated data within 3 seconds under typical load.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/dashboard
Response time is under 3 seconds
Returned metrics data matches expected aggregated values based on test database state

title: Configure and Retrieve Quality Gates for a Project
description: Verify creation, update, and retrieval of quality gate configurations for a given project.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/governance/gates with valid quality gate configuration for a project
API returns success and persists the configuration
Send GET request to /api/governance/gates/:projectId to retrieve quality gates
Retrieved quality gates match the recently saved configuration
Send POST request with invalid quality gate parameters
API returns 400 Bad Request with validation error message

title: Evaluate Quality Gate Pass/Fail Logic
description: Test whether the system correctly evaluates quality gate pass or fail statuses based on configured thresholds.

steps.description: Configure quality gates with defined pass/fail thresholds for a project
Trigger evaluation by querying release readiness or attempting release approval
System returns correct pass or fail result according to project data and gate configuration
Alter project data to cross thresholds to opposite state and re-evaluate
System updates evaluation status accordingly

title: Submit Release Approval and Audit Trail
description: Verify the process of submitting manual release approvals or rejections includes compulsory comments and audit logging.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/governance/approvals with approval action, project ID, and comment
API accepts approval submission and returns success
Verify audit logs contain entry for approval with full before/after states and comment
Audit log correctly captures the approval event details
Send approval submission without required comment
API rejects submission with validation error

title: Asynchronous Report Generation and Polling
description: Verify the API for report generation accepts requests, processes asynchronously, supports polling status and provides downloadable URLs.

steps.description: Send request to generate a report in PDF format
API returns a job ID or token indicating asynchronous processing
Poll the report status endpoint until the report generation is complete
Eventually receive a completion status and a valid download URL for the report
Download the generated report using the provided URL
Report file opens and contains expected content

title: Audit Log Completeness for CRUD and Governance Actions
description: Verify that audit logs are created for all create, update, delete, and governance-related operations with before and after snapshots.

steps.description: Perform create, update, and delete operations on projects, tasks, and resources
Audit logs record entries for each operation with full before and after state details
Perform governance actions including quality gate updates and release approvals
Audit logs capture governance actions in detail

title: Retrieve Governance Dashboard Summaries
description: Validate retrieval of release readiness, quality risks, project health, and dashboard summary endpoints deliver correct aggregated data.

steps.description: Call GET /api/governance/release-readiness
Response contains current release readiness data for all projects
Call GET /api/governance/quality-risks
Response contains quality risk assessments consistent with projects' data
Call GET /api/governance/project-health
Response provides a comprehensive project health summary
Call GET /api/governance/dashboard-summary
Response includes aggregated dashboard statistics

title: Validate Task Status Transitions and Assignments
description: Verify that tasks can be created and updated with valid status transitions and proper resource assignments, rejecting invalid data.

steps.description: Create a task with valid initial status and resource assignment
Task is created successfully with expected fields
Update task status in valid allowed transitions
Update succeeds and status changes correctly
Attempt to update task status with invalid transitions
API rejects update with validation errors
Assign resources exceeding availability during task creation
API responds with appropriate warnings or errors depending on capacity

title: Deployment Guide Reproducibility Verification
description: Test following the provided deployment guides to successfully deploy the QC Manager system locally with Docker Compose and on Hostinger VPS.

steps.description: Follow local deployment steps using Docker Compose
System deploys successfully with all services running and accessible
Follow Hostinger VPS deployment instructions
Application is accessible remotely with API and UI functioning correctly
